function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Globalization of design studios and classes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of different computing technologies in future cities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slowdown in technology advancements due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on smart wireless devices in urban areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimization of resource consumption in urban areas through big data and computational technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged existence of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Second/third wave of the pandemic in cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical reference to the spanish flu pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious disease propagation in urban areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial subsidies may lead to an increase in the production and distribution of iot devices, potentially increasing the risk of disease transmission through contaminated devices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of new technologies such as 6g, iot, and immersive xr may lead to an expansion of cashless economies, potentially influencing the spread of contagious diseases through the handling of cashless payments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The increased reliance on online schooling and work-at-home programs may result in prolonged close contact among individuals, leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in these settings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation of infrastructural capacity for 6g wireless technology due to different antenna and transceiver designs","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased network security challenges with the expansion of 6g technology and connectivity scope","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compatibility issues with 6g devices and sensors","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented energy consumption and high cost of energy-efficient devices","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost of implementing 6g technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical and moral issues related to 6g technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mobile apps for tracking covid-19 infected persons","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on video conferencing technologies for communications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones and robots for delivering medical supplies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased data sharing due to technological frameworks like 6g","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in data generation from various technologies like ai, crowd computing, ar, and 5g","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital inequality in cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in 5g deployment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with 6g wireless technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial limitations in technological infrastructure development for 6g implementation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to legal concerns and ethics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bias in favoring large ict corporations in the implementation of smart city products","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Local smes in the ict sector are overlooked for opportunities in data collection, storage, and computation, which are mostly handled by large corporations in smart cities.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Digital non-taxation regimes in different countries benefit large corporations, depriving local smes in the ict sector of fair competition and market access.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Post-covid-19 stimulus packages and strategies favor the embrace of new digital technologies, potentially creating a competitive advantage for larger politico-financed competitors over local smes in the ict sector.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cessation of the world trade organisation wto moratorium on custom duties for electronic transmissions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing rate of transactions coupling data and financial","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of new market-based instruments riding on the blockchain network","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development and application of 6g technology without considering health implications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global economic impact and recession due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of recognition and consideration of pandemics in urban planning and architectural professional institutions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to global travel and trade","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases such as zika, h1n1, and covid-19 leading to social and political tensions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to provide compensation to affected businesses during health crises","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extreme measures taken by citizens to prevent the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of planning and management leading to ostracism, racism, and social conflict","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hoarding of basic commodities and spreading fear","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe economic losses and decline in tourism due to pandemic measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled data collection and storage leading to privacy and security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High volume of data increasing the risk of data overload and mismanagement.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Segregation of information in the urban realm within independent private corporations and government bodies.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Configuration of sensor devices by contracted corporations to be incompatible with those of their competitors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cross-usage of data in monitoring internal country travel, leading to inadequate tracking of community dispersals and contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
